Hello,

I plan to use the Windows C++ version.

C++ because that is the language I am best at, and since I plan to alter
the code a little that seemed the best plan.

Windows because I like XP.

-Chris C

-----Original Message-----
From: Derek James [mailto:blue5432@...] 
Sent: Wednesday, September 03, 2003 1:01 PM
To: neat@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [neat] Implementations and Languages

Hi all,

Chris mentioned that he's working with NEAT for his
Master's thesis...which implementation do you plan to
use?  Or do you plan to write your own?

There are now multiple implementations of NEAT
available in different languages, and as I mentioned
in my introduction, Philip and I are nearly finished
with a Java implementation, which we plan to
open-source.

Those of you who have implemented your own version of
NEAT...why did you choose the particular language or
platform that you did?  

Derek
